casebody.data:
PINE
v.
WAL-MART ASSOCIATES, INC. #1552, et al. 335A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 3, 2018

Ms. Holly M. Stott, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, For Wal-Mart Associates, Inc. #1552, et al

Mr. M. Duane Jones, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, For Wal-Mart Associates, Inc. #1552, et al

Mr. David A. Shelby, Salisbury, Attorney at Law, For Pine, Patricia

Ms. Linda Stephens, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, For Wal-Mart Associates, Inc. #1552, et al

Mr. Vernon Sumwalt, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, For N.C. Advocates for Justice *517The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of June 2018 by Plaintiff to Deem Brief Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of August 2018."
